TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed StatementType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the type of SQL query to be used by the <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbRowUpdatedEventArgs">, <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbRowUpdatingEventArgs>, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlRowUpdatedEventArgs>, or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlRowUpdatingEventArgs> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.StatementType Batch = int32(4)

Docs.summary: A SQL query that is a batch statement.
